hero.headline: AI That Speaks Your Business Language
hero.description: Want to leverage AI but don't know where to start? Our team at Pailot makes AI work for your business—connecting the human touch with intelligent automation. We integrate your spreadsheets, custom apps, and enterprise software into one seamless solution.

seamlessIntegration.title: Seamless Integration

customBuilt.title: Custom-Built for You

smbFocused.title: Built for Growing Businesses

secureCompliant.title: Your Data, Your Control

measurableROI.title: Measurable Results

customDesign.title: Custom Solution Design

launchSupport.title: Launch & Support
